Symbol.Script_3D:
if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 then END if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 or (GLOB_CONTEXT>20 and GLOB_CONTEXT<40) then gs_resol=4 ! Simple
resol gs_resol pen gs_cont_pen
if not(gs_shadow) then SHADOW OFF
unid=4000
addy B/2 rotx gs_wall_ang addy -B/2
addy -(dis_wall - B/2) HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, ZZYZX, 1+128 :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, -1, unID, ZZYZX, 3 :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, ZZYZX, unID, ZZYZX, 2 :unID=unID+1 del 1
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Elbow ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ if gs_elbow then CALL "m_DSElbow" PARAMETERS gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=gs_gutter_ds_profile_num, gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa2, gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb2, gs_gutter_dd2=gs_gutter_dd2, gs_gutter_aa=gs_gutter_aa, gs_gutter_bb=gs_gutter_bb, gs_gutter_dd=gs_gutter_dd, gs_gutter_elb_u_lgth=gs_gutter_elb_u_lgth, gs_gutter_elb_u_ang=0, gs_gutter_elb_l_lgth=gs_gutter_elb_l_lgth, gs_gutter_elb_l_ang=gs_gutter_elb_l_ang, gs_gutter_elb_hor_overhang = gs_gutter_elb_hor_overhang, gs_gutter_topangle = -gs_gutter_ds_ang / 2, gs_detlevel_3D_m=gs_detlevel_3D_m, gs_resol=gs_resol, gs_shadow=gs_shadow, gs_line_type=gs_line_type, gs_cont_pen=gs_cont_pen, gs_gutter_ds_mat=gs_gutter_ds_mat, gs_HtpsMacro=gs_HtpsMacro, dis_wall = dis_wall
endif
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Downspout and Downspout Hanger ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ addz zzyzx_elbow*gs_elbow addy -(dis_wall - B/2) rotx gs_gutter_ds_ang addy (dis_wall - B/2) rotx -gs_gutter_ds_ang
if not(gs_downspout_offset) then tempangle = -gs_gutter_ds_ang else tempangle = -gs_gutter_ds_ang / 2
call "m_DS" parameters all gs_gutter_topangle = tempangle, gs_gutter_bottomangle = tempangle
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Downspout Offset ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ del 2 addz gs_gutter_ds_lgth rotx -gs_gutter_ds_ang
if gs_downspout_offset then HOTSPOT 0, HeadLeader_hor_offset, 0, unID, DsOffsetLength, 1+128 :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, HeadLeader_hor_offset, -1, unID, DsOffsetLength, 3 :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, HeadLeader_hor_offset, DsOffsetLength, unID, DsOffsetLength, 2 :unID=unID+1 endif
addy -(B/2 - dis_wall)
if gs_downspout_offset then
CALL "m_DSOffset" PARAMETERS ZZYZX=DsOffsetLength, gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=gs_gutter_ds_profile_num, gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa2, gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb2, gs_gutter_dd2=gs_gutter_dd2, gs_gutter_aa=gs_gutter_aa, gs_gutter_bb=gs_gutter_bb, gs_gutter_dd=gs_gutter_dd, gs_gutter_os_u_lgth=gs_gutter_os_u_lgth, gs_gutter_os_u_ang=gs_gutter_os_u_ang, gs_gutter_u_end_ang=gs_gutter_u_end_ang, up_end_ang_temp=up_end_ang_temp, gs_gutter_os_off=gs_gutter_os_off, gs_gutter_os_m_lgth=gs_gutter_os_m_lgth, gs_gutter_os_m_lgth_temp=gs_gutter_os_m_lgth_temp, gs_gutter_os_ang=gs_gutter_os_ang, gs_gutter_os_l_lgth=gs_gutter_os_l_lgth, gs_gutter_os_l_ang=0, !!gs_gutter_os_l_ang, !!HIDE gs_gutter_l_end_ang=-gs_gutter_ds_ang/2, !!gs_gutter_l_end_ang, !!HIDE low_end_ang_temp=low_end_ang_temp, !!HIDE gs_detlevel_3D_m=gs_detlevel_3D_m, gs_resol=gs_resol, gs_shadow=gs_shadow, gs_line_type=gs_line_type, gs_cont_pen=gs_cont_pen, gs_gutter_ds_mat=gs_gutter_ds_mat, gs_HtpsMacro=gs_HtpsMacro, dis_wall = dis_wall
endif
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Head Leader ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ add 0, B/2 - dis_wall + HeadLeader_hor_offset, gs_downspout_offset * DSOffsetLength
if gs_head_leader then
HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, HL_Height, 1+128 :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, -1, unID, HL_Height, 3 :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, HL_Height, unID, HL_Height, 2 :unID=unID+1
if not(gs_downspout_offset) then addy -(B/2 - dis_wall)
CALL "m_HeadLeader" PARAMETERS gs_gutter_hl_type_m=gs_gutter_hl_type_m, HL_Width=HL_Width, HL_Width2=HL_Width2, HL_Frame=HL_Frame, HL_Depth=HL_Depth, HL_Height=HL_Height, gs_gutter_hl_guard=gs_gutter_hl_guard, gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=gs_gutter_ds_profile_num, gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa2, gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb2, gs_gutter_dd2=gs_gutter_dd2, gs_gutter_aa=gs_gutter_aa, gs_gutter_bb=gs_gutter_bb, gs_gutter_dd=gs_gutter_dd, gs_detlevel_3D_m=gs_detlevel_3D_m, gs_resol=gs_resol, gs_shadow=gs_shadow, gs_line_type=gs_line_type, gs_cont_pen=gs_cont_pen, gs_gutter_hl_mat=gs_gutter_hl_mat, gs_gutter_guard_mat=gs_gutter_guard_mat, gs_HtpsMacro=gs_HtpsMacro, dis_wall = dis_wall
if not(gs_downspout_offset) then del 1
! connect head leader and offset? ! if gs_gutter_u_end_ang > EPS then ! ltemp = B/2 * abs(tan(gs_gutter_u_end_ang/2)) ! call "m_DS" parameters all zzyzx = ltemp, ! gs_gutter_ds_lgth = ltemp, ! gs_gutter_ds_ang = 0, ! TopCut = 0, ! gs_gutter_topangle = 0, ! gs_gutter_bottomangle = gs_gutter_u_end_ang, ! gs_gutter_ds_h = 0, ! dis_wall = B/2, ! gs_HtpsMacro = 1 ! endif endif del 10
Symbol.Script_2D:
pen gs_cont_pen line_type gs_line_type fill gs_fill_type
if abs(gs_wall_ang) < EPS then
if GLOB_CH_STORY_DIST < -EPS then gs_gutter_ds_h = 0 line_type overhead_Line_Type pen gs_cont_pen _frame_fill = 5 gosub "tube" else
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Projected ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_PROJECTED then
gosub "elbow" gosub "tube"
if gs_downspout_offset=1 then gosub "offset" endif
if gs_head_leader=1 then gosub "head_leader" endif
endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Projected With Overhead ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_PROJ then
gosub "elbow" gosub "tube"
if gs_downspout_offset=1 then gosub "offset" endif
if gs_head_leader=1 then gosub "head_leader" endif endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Symbolic ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_SYMBOLIC then gosub "tube" endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Outlines Only ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OUTLINES then
gosub "elbow"
gosub "tube"
if gs_downspout_offset=1 then gosub "offset" endif
if gs_head_leader=1 then gosub "head_leader" endif
endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Overhead All ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_ALL then if gs_head_leader = 1 then gosub "head_leader" endif
if gs_downspout_offset = 1 then gosub "offset" endif
gosub "elbow"
gosub "tube" endif endif
unID = 4000 ! --- Wall HOTSPOT2 0, B/2, unID :unID=unID+1
else tempZZYZX = (zzyzx_elbow * gs_elbow) + gs_gutter_ds_lgth * cos(gs_gutter_ds_ang) + (DsOffsetLength * gs_downspout_offset) + (HL_Height * gs_head_leader) tempOffset = gs_gutter_ds_lgth * sin(gs_gutter_ds_ang) + (gs_gutter_os_off + gs_gutter_os_u_lgth * tan(gs_gutter_os_u_ang)) * gs_downspout_offset tempLength = tempZZYZX * sin(gs_wall_ang) + tempOffset * cos(gs_wall_ang)
if gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = 1 then ! Round tempWidth2A = gs_gutter_dd tempWidth2B = gs_gutter_dd else tempWidth2A = gs_gutter_aa tempWidth2B = gs_gutter_bb endif
add2 0, tempWidth2B - (dis_wall - tempWidth2B) * cos(gs_wall_ang)
if gs_head_leader = 1 then add2 0, -tempLength POLY2_B 5, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -HL_Width/2, 0, 1, HL_Width/2, 0, 1, HL_Width/2, -HL_Depth * cos(gs_wall_ang), 1, -HL_Width/2, -HL_Depth * cos(gs_wall_ang), 1, -HL_Width/2, 0, -1
LINE2 -tempWidth2A, 0, tempWidth2A, 0
del 1 endif
CALL "m_DSProfiles" PARAMETERS gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=gs_gutter_ds_profile_num, gs_gutter_aa=gs_gutter_aa, gs_gutter_bb=gs_gutter_bb, gs_gutter_dd=gs_gutter_dd, dis_wall = dis_wall
! --- Lower End --- mul2 1, cos(gs_wall_ang) add2 0, -tempWidth2B POLY2_B{2} nsp/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, use (nsp) del 2
! --- Downspout --- add2 0, -tempWidth2B * cos(gs_wall_ang) POLY2_B 5, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -tempWidth2A, 0, 0, tempWidth2A, 0, 1, tempWidth2A, -tempLength, 0, -tempWidth2A, -tempLength, 1, -tempWidth2A, 0, -1 del 1
! --- Upper End --- add2 0, -tempLength mul2 1, cos(gs_wall_ang) add2 0, -tempWidth2B
POLY2_B{2} nsp/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, get (nsp)
del 3
unID=4000 add2 0, -tempWidth2B * cos(gs_wall_ang)
! --- Length --- HOTSPOT2 0,0,unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,-tempLength/2,unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,-tempLength,unID :unID=unID+1
for kk=1 to 2 ! --- Profile --- if gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = 1 then ! Round HOTSPOT2 0,tempWidth2B*COS(gs_wall_ang),unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 tempWidth2A,0,unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,-tempWidth2B*COS(gs_wall_ang),unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -tempWidth2A,0,unID :unID=unID+1 else HOTSPOT2 -tempWidth2A,tempWidth2B*COS(gs_wall_ang),unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 tempWidth2A,tempWidth2B*COS(gs_wall_ang),unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 tempWidth2A,-tempWidth2B*COS(gs_wall_ang),unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -tempWidth2A,-tempWidth2B*COS(gs_wall_ang),unID :unID=unID+1 endif add2 0,-tempLength next kk del 3
! --- Head Leader --- if gs_head_leader=1 then add2 0, -tempLength
HOTSPOT2 -HL_Width/2,0,unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 HL_Width/2,0,unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 HL_Width/2,- HL_Depth*COS(gs_wall_ang),unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -HL_Width/2,- HL_Depth*COS(gs_wall_ang),unID :unID=unID+1
del 1 endif
! --- Wall HOTSPOT2 0, (dis_wall - tempWidth2B) * cos(gs_wall_ang), unID :unID=unID+1
endif
end ! ============================================================================= !END !END !END !END !END !END !END !END !END !END ! =============================================================================
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- "head_leader": ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- drawindex 20 if gs_downspout_offset = 1 then add2 0, HeadLeader_hor_offset endif
add2 0, -gs_gutter_ds_lgth * sin(gs_gutter_ds_ang) + B/2 - dis_wall
CALL "m_HeadLeader" PARAMETERS gs_gutter_hl_type_m=gs_gutter_hl_type_m, HL_Width=HL_Width, HL_Width2=HL_Width2, HL_Frame=HL_Frame, HL_Depth=HL_Depth, HL_Height=HL_Height, gs_gutter_hl_guard=gs_gutter_hl_guard, gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=gs_gutter_ds_profile_num, gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa2, gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb2, gs_gutter_dd2=gs_gutter_dd2, gs_gutter_aa=gs_gutter_aa, gs_gutter_bb=gs_gutter_bb, gs_gutter_dd=gs_gutter_dd, gs_detlevel_3D_m=gs_detlevel_3D_m, gs_resol=gs_resol, gs_shadow=gs_shadow, gs_line_type=gs_line_type, gs_cont_pen=gs_cont_pen, gs_gutter_hl_mat=gs_gutter_hl_mat, gs_gutter_guard_mat=gs_gutter_guard_mat, gs_HtpsMacro=gs_HtpsMacro, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen,gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, cut_pen = cut_pen, overhead_Line_Type = overhead_Line_Type, iFloorPlanDisplayType = iFloorPlanDisplayType, vertical_offset = HeadLeader_ver_offset, dis_wall = dis_wall
del 1
if gs_downspout_offset = 1 then del 1 endif return
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- "offset": ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- drawindex 10 add2 0, -gs_gutter_ds_lgth * sin(gs_gutter_ds_ang) !+ B/2 - dis_wall
CALL "m_DSOffset" PARAMETERS ZZYZX=DsOffsetLength, gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=gs_gutter_ds_profile_num, gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa2, gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb2, gs_gutter_dd2=gs_gutter_dd2, gs_gutter_aa=gs_gutter_aa, gs_gutter_bb=gs_gutter_bb, gs_gutter_dd=gs_gutter_dd, gs_gutter_os_u_lgth=gs_gutter_os_u_lgth, gs_gutter_os_u_ang=gs_gutter_os_u_ang, gs_gutter_u_end_ang=gs_gutter_u_end_ang, up_end_ang_temp=up_end_ang_temp, gs_gutter_os_off=gs_gutter_os_off, gs_gutter_os_m_lgth=gs_gutter_os_m_lgth, gs_gutter_os_m_lgth_temp=gs_gutter_os_m_lgth_temp, gs_gutter_os_ang=gs_gutter_os_ang, gs_gutter_os_l_lgth=gs_gutter_os_l_lgth, gs_gutter_os_l_ang=gs_gutter_os_l_ang, !!HIDE gs_gutter_l_end_ang=gs_gutter_l_end_ang, !!HIDE low_end_ang_temp=low_end_ang_temp, !!HIDE gs_detlevel_3D_m=gs_detlevel_3D_m, gs_resol=gs_resol, gs_shadow=gs_shadow, gs_line_type=gs_line_type, gs_cont_pen=gs_cont_pen, gs_gutter_ds_mat=gs_gutter_ds_mat, gs_HtpsMacro=gs_HtpsMacro,gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen,gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, cut_pen = cut_pen, overhead_Line_Type = overhead_Line_Type, iFloorPlanDisplayType = iFloorPlanDisplayType, vertical_offset = DSoffset_ver_offset, dis_wall = dis_wall del 1 return
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- "elbow": ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- drawindex 10 if gs_elbow = 1 then if GLOB_CH_STORY_DIST < EPS then if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_ALL then CALL "m_DSElbow" PARAMETERS all gs_line_type = overhead_line_type else CALL "m_DSElbow" PARAMETERS all endif endif endif return
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- "tube": ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_ALL or GLOB_CH_STORY_DIST < -EPS then CALL "m_DS" PARAMETERS gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=gs_gutter_ds_profile_num, gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa2, gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb2, gs_gutter_dd2=gs_gutter_dd2, gs_gutter_aa=gs_gutter_aa, gs_gutter_bb=gs_gutter_bb, gs_gutter_dd=gs_gutter_dd, gs_gutter_ds_lgth=gs_gutter_ds_lgth, gs_gutter_ds_ang = gs_wall_ang + gs_gutter_ds_ang, !!HIDE TopCut=0, gs_gutter_ds_h=gs_gutter_ds_h, gs_gutter_ds_h_dist=gs_gutter_ds_h_dist, gs_gutter_ds_h_off=gs_gutter_ds_h_off, gs_gutter_ds_h_pos=gs_gutter_ds_h_pos, gs_gutter_ds_h_pos_mod=gs_gutter_ds_h_pos_mod, gs_detlevel_3D_m=gs_detlevel_3D_m, gs_resol=gs_resol, gs_shadow=gs_shadow, gs_line_type=overhead_Line_Type, gs_cont_pen=gs_cont_pen, gs_gutter_ds_mat=gs_gutter_ds_mat, gs_gutter_ds_h_mat=gs_gutter_ds_h_mat, gs_HtpsMacro=gs_HtpsMacro, cut_pen = cut_pen, overhead_Line_Type = overhead_Line_Type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen,gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, dis_wall = dis_wall, gs_gutter_type=gs_gutter_type else CALL "m_DS" PARAMETERS gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=gs_gutter_ds_profile_num, gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa2, gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb2, gs_gutter_dd2=gs_gutter_dd2, gs_gutter_aa=gs_gutter_aa, gs_gutter_bb=gs_gutter_bb, gs_gutter_dd=gs_gutter_dd, gs_gutter_ds_lgth=gs_gutter_ds_lgth, gs_gutter_ds_ang = gs_wall_ang + gs_gutter_ds_ang, !!HIDE TopCut=0, gs_gutter_ds_h=gs_gutter_ds_h, gs_gutter_ds_h_dist=gs_gutter_ds_h_dist, gs_gutter_ds_h_off=gs_gutter_ds_h_off, gs_gutter_ds_h_pos=gs_gutter_ds_h_pos, gs_gutter_ds_h_pos_mod=gs_gutter_ds_h_pos_mod, gs_detlevel_3D_m=gs_detlevel_3D_m, gs_resol=gs_resol, gs_shadow=gs_shadow, gs_line_type=gs_line_type, gs_cont_pen=gs_cont_pen, gs_gutter_ds_mat=gs_gutter_ds_mat, gs_gutter_ds_h_mat=gs_gutter_ds_h_mat, gs_HtpsMacro=gs_HtpsMacro, cut_pen = cut_pen, overhead_Line_Type = overhead_Line_Type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen,gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, dis_wall = dis_wall, gs_gutter_type=gs_gutter_type endif return
Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS = 0.000001 sthw=0.02 ! hanger width dswh=0.04 ! downspout-hanger width gs_HtpsMacro = 1
!------------ Floor Plan Display type integer definitions ----------------------
DISPLAY_PROJECTED = 1 DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_PROJ = 2 DISPLAY_SYMBOLIC = 3 DISPLAY_OUTLINES = 4 DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_ALL = 5
!------------ 3D Detail Level ------------------------------------------------- DETLEVEL_3D_OFF = 0 DETLEVEL_3D_SIMPLE = 1 DETLEVEL_3D_DETAILED = 2
!------------ Downspout Profile Type ------------------------------------------ PROFILE_ROUND = 1 PROFILE_RECTANGULAR = 2 PROFILE_CORRUGATED = 3
!------------ Hanger Positioning Type ----------------------------------------- HANGER_CUSTOM = 1 HANGER_UNIFORM = 2
dim stHangerPositioning[2] stHangerPositioning[1] = `Специальный` stHangerPositioning[2] = `Одинаковое`
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! USA profiles ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[1] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[2] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[11] then parameters gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = 1 endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[3] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[4] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[5] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[6] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[12] then parameters gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = 2 endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[7] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[8] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[9] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[10] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[13] then parameters gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = 3 endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[1] then parameters gs_gutter_dd=3*0.5*0.0254 gs_gutter_dd=3*0.5*0.0254 parameters gs_gutter_dd2=gs_gutter_dd*2 gs_gutter_dd2=gs_gutter_dd*2 lock "gs_gutter_dd2" endif if gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[2] then parameters gs_gutter_dd=4*0.5*0.0254 gs_gutter_dd=4*0.5*0.0254 parameters gs_gutter_dd2=gs_gutter_dd*2 gs_gutter_dd2=gs_gutter_dd*2 lock "gs_gutter_dd2" endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[3] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[7] then parameters gs_gutter_aa=0.0254 gs_gutter_aa=0.0254 parameters gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa*2 gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa*2 parameters gs_gutter_bb=0.0381 gs_gutter_bb=0.0381 parameters gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb*2 gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb*2 lock "gs_gutter_aa2" lock "gs_gutter_bb2" endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[4] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[8] then parameters gs_gutter_aa=0.0381 gs_gutter_aa=0.0381 parameters gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa*2 gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa*2 parameters gs_gutter_bb=0.0254 gs_gutter_bb=0.0254 parameters gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb*2 gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb*2 lock "gs_gutter_aa2" lock "gs_gutter_bb2" endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[5] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[9] then parameters gs_gutter_aa=0.0381 gs_gutter_aa=0.0381 parameters gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa*2 gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa*2 parameters gs_gutter_bb=0.0508 gs_gutter_bb=0.0508 parameters gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb*2 gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb*2 lock "gs_gutter_aa2" lock "gs_gutter_bb2" endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[6] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[10] then parameters gs_gutter_aa=0.0508 gs_gutter_aa=0.0508 parameters gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa*2 gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa*2 parameters gs_gutter_bb=0.0381 gs_gutter_bb=0.0381 parameters gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb*2 gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb*2 lock "gs_gutter_aa2" lock "gs_gutter_bb2" endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Downspout Hanger parameters ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Change downspout length or change ds hanger offset !IF gs_gutter_ds_h_positioning = HANGER_UNIFORM THEN ! if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_lgth" OR GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_h_off" OR GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_h_positioning" then ! for i=1 to INT((gs_gutter_ds_lgth - gs_gutter_ds_h_off - sthw)/gs_gutter_ds_h_dist)+1 ! if gs_gutter_ds_h_pos_mod[i] = 0 then ! PARAMETERS gs_gutter_ds_h_pos[i]=(i-1)*gs_gutter_ds_h_dist+gs_gutter_ds_h_off ! endif ! next i ! endif ! ! ! Change distance between ds hangers ! if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_h_dist" then ! for i=1 to INT((gs_gutter_ds_lgth - gs_gutter_ds_h_off - sthw)/gs_gutter_ds_h_dist)+1 ! if gs_gutter_ds_h_pos_mod[i] = 0 then ! PARAMETERS gs_gutter_ds_h_pos[i]=(i-1)*gs_gutter_ds_h_dist+gs_gutter_ds_h_off ! endif ! next i ! endif ! !ELSE ! hangeri = 1 ! j = 0 ! WHILE j <= gs_gutter_ds_lgth AND hangeri < 99 AND gs_gutter_ds_h_pos_helper[hangeri] > EPS DO ! j = gs_gutter_ds_h_pos_helper[hangeri] ! hangeri = hangeri + 1 ! ENDWHILE ! ! hangeri = hangeri-1 ! ! if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_h_pos_helper" THEN ! lenght = 0 ! FOR i=1 to hangeri ! lenght = lenght + gs_gutter_ds_h_pos_helper[i] ! PARAMETERS gs_gutter_ds_h_pos[i] = lenght ! NEXT i ! FOR i=hangeri+1 to vardim1(gs_gutter_ds_h_pos) ! PARAMETERS gs_gutter_ds_h_pos[i] = 0 ! NEXT i ! ENDIF ! ! if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_h_pos" THEN ! PARAMETERS gs_gutter_ds_h_pos_helper[1] = gs_gutter_ds_h_pos[1] ! FOR i = 2 to hangeri ! PARAMETERS gs_gutter_ds_h_pos_helper[i] = (gs_gutter_ds_h_pos[i] - gs_gutter_ds_h_pos[i-1]) ! NEXT i ! ENDIF ! ! j = 0 ! FOR i = 1 to vardim1(gs_gutter_ds_h_pos) ! j = gs_gutter_ds_h_pos[i] ! IF j >= gs_gutter_ds_lgth OR gs_gutter_ds_h_pos[i] < 0 THEN ! PARAMETERS gs_gutter_ds_h_pos[i] = 0 ! ENDIF ! NEXT i !ENDIF
hangeri = INT((gs_gutter_ds_lgth - gs_gutter_ds_h_off - sthw)/gs_gutter_ds_h_dist)+1 for i=1 to INT((gs_gutter_ds_lgth - gs_gutter_ds_h_off - sthw)/gs_gutter_ds_h_dist)+1 PARAMETERS gs_gutter_ds_h_pos[i]=(i-1)*gs_gutter_ds_h_dist+gs_gutter_ds_h_off next i PARAMETERS gs_gutter_ds_h_pos_helper[1] = gs_gutter_ds_h_pos[1] FOR i = 2 to hangeri PARAMETERS gs_gutter_ds_h_pos_helper[i] = (gs_gutter_ds_h_pos[i] - gs_gutter_ds_h_pos[i-1]) NEXT i
Symbol.Script_PR:
rz = ";" tip_el = "40" obozn = "МеталлПрофиль" name_syst = "МП Проект" Dtxt = "D" + str("%.0mm", gs_gutter_dd2) ros = 7850*0.0005 komment = "шт."
!Труба pos = "ТВ" kol_vo_spec = round_int(gs_gutter_ds_lgth/3) ves = gs_gutter_dd2*3.14*ros* kol_vo_spec*3 naen = "Труба водосточная " + Dtxt +"х3" gosub "spec"
pos = " " !Крепёж if gs_gutter_ds_h then kol_vo_spec = round_int(gs_gutter_ds_lgth/gs_gutter_ds_h_dist) ves = 0.2 naen = "Держатель трубы на саморезе" gosub "spec" endif
!Воронка if gs_head_leader then kol_vo_spec = 1 ves = 0.4 naen = "Воронка водосборная D"+ str("%.0mm", HL_Width)+"/" + Dtxt gosub "spec" endif
!Колено if gs_elbow then kol_vo_spec = 1 ves = 0.4 naen = "Колено трубы сливное "+ Dtxt + "("+str("%.0", gs_gutter_elb_l_ang)+")" gosub "spec" endif
!Колено 2 kol_vo_spec = 1 ves = 0.4 naen = "Колено трубы сливное "+ Dtxt + "(60)" gosub "spec"
end "spec": call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el=tip_el, subpos = "-", pos = pos, obozn=obozn, naen=name_syst + " " + naen, ves=ves, kol_vo_spec=kol_vo_spec, komment=komment return

call "ui_object_listing" parameters all listfieldID = TABID_LISTING, listFieldPosY = 0, listFieldHeight = 265, stDescHeader = "", stValueHeader = "", stParamNames = stParamNames return
Symbol.Script_VL:
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Hide all paremeterlist ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- hideparameter all "A", "B", "ZZYZX" parameters gs_gutter_ds_h_positioning = HANGER_UNIFORM VALUES "gs_wall_ang" RANGE (-90,90) values "gs_gutter_ds_ang" range (-90, 90)
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! UI parameters ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ if GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID < 0 then parameters gs_ui_current_page = -GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID endif
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Hanger Positioning ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- values{2} "gs_gutter_ds_h_positioning", HANGER_CUSTOM, stHangerPositioning[1], HANGER_UNIFORM, stHangerPositioning[2]
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Profile ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ if LibraryLangCode = "USA" then
values "gs_gutter_ds_profile" stGutterDsProfiles
values "gs_gutter_ds_profile_num" PROFILE_ROUND, PROFILE_RECTANGULAR, PROFILE_CORRUGATED
if gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[1] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[2] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[11] THEN parameters gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = PROFILE_ROUND endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[3] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[4] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[5] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[6] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[12] THEN parameters gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = PROFILE_RECTANGULAR endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[7] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[7] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[8] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[9] OR gs_gutter_ds_profile = stGutterDsProfiles[13] THEN parameters gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = PROFILE_CORRUGATED endif
else
values "gs_gutter_ds_profile" `Круглый`,`Прямоугольный`,`Закругленный`
values "gs_gutter_ds_profile_num" PROFILE_ROUND, PROFILE_RECTANGULAR, PROFILE_CORRUGATED
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = PROFILE_RECTANGULAR if gs_gutter_ds_profile = `Круглый` then gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = PROFILE_ROUND if gs_gutter_ds_profile = `Закругленный` then gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = PROFILE_CORRUGATED parameters gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = gs_gutter_ds_profile_num else gs_gutter_ds_profile = `Прямоугольный` if gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = PROFILE_ROUND then gs_gutter_ds_profile = `Круглый` if gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = PROFILE_CORRUGATED then gs_gutter_ds_profile = `Закругленный` parameters gs_gutter_ds_profile = gs_gutter_ds_profile endif
endif
VALUES "gs_gutter_aa" RANGE (0,) VALUES "gs_gutter_aa2" RANGE (0,) VALUES "gs_gutter_bb" RANGE (0,) VALUES "gs_gutter_bb2" RANGE (0,) VALUES "gs_gutter_dd" RANGE (0,) VALUES "gs_gutter_dd2" RANGE (0,)
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_dd" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then gs_gutter_dd2 = gs_gutter_dd*2 parameters gs_gutter_dd2 = gs_gutter_dd2 else gs_gutter_dd = gs_gutter_dd2/2 parameters gs_gutter_dd = gs_gutter_dd endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_aa" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_bb" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then gs_gutter_aa2 = 2 * gs_gutter_aa gs_gutter_bb2 = 2 * gs_gutter_bb parameters gs_gutter_aa2 = gs_gutter_aa2, gs_gutter_bb2 = gs_gutter_bb2 else gs_gutter_aa = gs_gutter_aa2 / 2 gs_gutter_bb = gs_gutter_bb2 / 2 parameters gs_gutter_aa = gs_gutter_aa, gs_gutter_bb = gs_gutter_bb endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = 1 then ! Round HIDEPARAMETER "gs_gutter_aa2" HIDEPARAMETER "gs_gutter_bb2" else HIDEPARAMETER "gs_gutter_dd2" endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! A, B ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = 1 then !round A = gs_gutter_dd2 Bhalf = gs_gutter_dd else A = gs_gutter_aa2 Bhalf = gs_gutter_bb endif
B = 2 * Bhalf parameters A = A, B = B lock "A", "B"
values "dis_wall" range [Bhalf, )
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! ZZYZX ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
minh_elbow = B minh_downspout = 0 minh_offset = 2 * B minh_HL = 0.05
values "ZZYZX" range [gs_elbow * zzyzx_elbow + minh_downspout + gs_downspout_offset * minh_offset + gs_head_leader * minh_HL, )
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ZZYZX" then gs_gutter_ds_lgth = ZZYZX - gs_elbow * zzyzx_elbow - gs_downspout_offset * DsOffsetLength - gs_head_leader * HL_Height parameters gs_gutter_ds_lgth = gs_gutter_ds_lgth else ZZYZX = gs_elbow * zzyzx_elbow + gs_gutter_ds_lgth + gs_downspout_offset * DsOffsetLength + gs_head_leader * HL_Height parameters ZZYZX = ZZYZX endif
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Elbow ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ zzyzx_elbow = gs_gutter_elb_u_lgth + gs_gutter_elb_l_lgth * cos(gs_gutter_elb_l_ang) + Bhalf * sin(gs_gutter_elb_l_ang) parameters zzyzx_elbow = zzyzx_elbow
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_elb_hor_overhang" then gs_gutter_elb_l_lgth = (gs_gutter_elb_hor_overhang + Bhalf * cos(gs_gutter_elb_l_ang)) / sin(gs_gutter_elb_l_ang) gs_gutter_ds_lgth = zzyzx - zzyzx_elbow - gs_downspout_offset * DsOffsetLength - gs_head_leader * HL_Height parameters gs_gutter_elb_l_lgth = gs_gutter_elb_l_lgth, gs_gutter_ds_lgth = gs_gutter_ds_lgth else gs_gutter_elb_hor_overhang = gs_gutter_elb_l_lgth * sin(gs_gutter_elb_l_ang) - Bhalf * cos(gs_gutter_elb_l_ang) parameters gs_gutter_elb_hor_overhang = gs_gutter_elb_hor_overhang endif
VALUES "gs_gutter_elb_u_lgth" RANGE [Bhalf, ) VALUES "gs_gutter_elb_l_lgth" RANGE (0, ) VALUES "gs_gutter_elb_u_ang" RANGE [0, 90] VALUES "gs_gutter_elb_l_ang" RANGE [0, 90]
if not(gs_elbow) then hideparameter "gs_gutter_elb_u_lgth", "gs_gutter_elb_u_ang", "gs_gutter_elb_l_lgth", "gs_gutter_elb_l_ang" lock "gs_gutter_elb_u_lgth", "gs_gutter_elb_u_ang", "gs_gutter_elb_l_lgth", "gs_gutter_elb_l_ang" endif
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Head Lader and Downspout Prameters ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ VALUES "gs_gutter_hl_type" `Тип 1`,`Тип 2`,`Тип 3`,`Тип 4`,`Тип 5` values "gs_gutter_hl_type_m" 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_hl_type" then gs_gutter_hl_type_m = 1 if gs_gutter_hl_type=`Тип 2` then gs_gutter_hl_type_m = 2 if gs_gutter_hl_type=`Тип 3` then gs_gutter_hl_type_m = 3 if gs_gutter_hl_type=`Тип 4` then gs_gutter_hl_type_m = 4 if gs_gutter_hl_type=`Тип 5` then gs_gutter_hl_type_m = 5 parameters gs_gutter_hl_type_m = gs_gutter_hl_type_m else gs_gutter_hl_type = `Тип 1` if gs_gutter_hl_type_m = 2 then gs_gutter_hl_type = `Тип 2` if gs_gutter_hl_type_m = 3 then gs_gutter_hl_type = `Тип 3` if gs_gutter_hl_type_m = 4 then gs_gutter_hl_type = `Тип 4` if gs_gutter_hl_type_m = 5 then gs_gutter_hl_type = `Тип 5` parameters gs_gutter_hl_type = gs_gutter_hl_type endif
VALUES "HL_Width" RANGE [A + 0.05,) VALUES "HL_Width2" RANGE [(A + 0.05) / 2,) VALUES "HL_Depth" RANGE [B + 0.025,)
if gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = 1 then ! Round
gs_gutter_aa = gs_gutter_dd gs_gutter_bb = gs_gutter_dd
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_dd" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_dd2" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then HL_Width2 = gs_gutter_dd + HL_Frame HL_Width = 2 * HL_Width2 HL_Depth = 2 * gs_gutter_dd + HL_Frame PARAMETERS HL_Width = HL_Width, HL_Width2 = HL_Width2, HL_Depth = HL_Depth endif
else
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_aa" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_aa2" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then HL_Width2 = gs_gutter_aa + HL_Frame HL_Width = 2 * HL_Width2 PARAMETERS HL_Width = HL_Width, HL_Width2 = HL_Width2 endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_bb" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_bb2" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then HL_Depth = B + HL_Frame PARAMETERS HL_Depth = HL_Depth endif
endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "HL_Width" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then HL_Frame=(HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2 HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_bb+HL_Frame HL_Width2 = HL_Width/2 else if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "HL_Width2" then HL_Frame=(2*HL_Width2-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2 HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_bb+HL_Frame HL_Width = HL_Width2*2 else if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "HL_Frame" then HL_Width=2*gs_gutter_aa+2*HL_Frame HL_Width2=gs_gutter_aa+HL_Frame HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_bb+HL_Frame else HL_Frame=HL_Depth-2*gs_gutter_bb HL_Width=2*gs_gutter_aa+2*HL_Frame HL_Width2=gs_gutter_aa+HL_Frame endif endif endif PARAMETERS HL_Width = HL_Width PARAMETERS HL_Width2 = HL_Width2 PARAMETERS HL_Frame = HL_Frame PARAMETERS HL_Depth = HL_Depth
VALUES "HL_Height" RANGE [minh_HL, )
VALUES "gs_gutter_ds_h_off" RANGE [0, ) VALUES "gs_gutter_ds_h_dist" RANGE [0, ) VALUES "gs_gutter_ds_lgth" RANGE [minh_downspout, )
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Head Leader Guard ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ if not(gs_gutter_hl_guard) then LOCK "gs_gutter_guard_mat"
if not(gs_head_leader) then hideparameter "gs_gutter_hl_type","HL_Width","HL_Height","HL_Depth", "gs_gutter_hl_guard","gs_gutter_hl_mat","gs_gutter_guard_mat", "gs_gutter_hl_type_m"
lock "gs_gutter_hl_type","HL_Width","HL_Height","HL_Depth", "gs_gutter_hl_guard","gs_gutter_hl_mat","gs_gutter_guard_mat", "gs_gutter_hl_type_m"
endif
if not(gs_gutter_ds_h) then hideparameter "gs_gutter_ds_h_dist","gs_gutter_ds_h_off", "gs_gutter_ds_h_pos","gs_gutter_ds_h_pos_mod", "gs_gutter_ds_h_mat", "gs_gutter_ds_h_positioning" lock "gs_gutter_ds_h_dist","gs_gutter_ds_h_off", "gs_gutter_ds_h_pos","gs_gutter_ds_h_pos_mod", "gs_gutter_ds_h_mat", "gs_gutter_ds_h_positioning" endif
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Downspout Offset ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_os_ang" then !--- felső szakasz és kinyúlás fix, középső és alsó szakaszt változtatjuk
if (gs_gutter_os_ang + EPS) >= 90 then gs_gutter_os_m_lgth = 0 else if gs_gutter_os_ang > 0 then gs_gutter_os_m_lgth = gs_gutter_os_off / tan(gs_gutter_os_ang) endif gs_gutter_os_l_lgth = DsOffsetLength - gs_gutter_os_u_lgth - gs_gutter_os_m_lgth parameters gs_gutter_os_m_lgth = gs_gutter_os_m_lgth, gs_gutter_os_l_lgth = gs_gutter_os_l_lgth else if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "DsOffsetLength" and gs_gutter_os_l_lgth > minh_offset / 2 then !--- középső szakasz dőlés fix, alsó szakasz hosszát változtatjuk
gs_gutter_os_l_lgth = DsOffsetLength - gs_gutter_os_u_lgth - gs_gutter_os_m_lgth parameters gs_gutter_os_l_lgth = gs_gutter_os_l_lgth else !--- középső szakasz dőlést változtatjuk
gs_gutter_os_m_lgth = DsOffsetLength - gs_gutter_os_u_lgth - gs_gutter_os_l_lgth if gs_gutter_os_m_lgth < EPS then gs_gutter_os_ang = 90 else gs_gutter_os_ang = ATN(gs_gutter_os_off / gs_gutter_os_m_lgth) endif parameters gs_gutter_os_m_lgth = gs_gutter_os_m_lgth, gs_gutter_os_ang = gs_gutter_os_ang endif endif
VALUES "DsOffsetLength" RANGE [minh_offset, )
VALUES "gs_gutter_os_u_lgth" RANGE [minh_offset / 2, DsOffsetLength - minh_offset/2] VALUES "gs_gutter_os_l_lgth" RANGE [minh_offset / 2, DsOffsetLength - minh_offset/2] VALUES "gs_gutter_os_off" RANGE [A/2, ) if DsOffsetLength <= minh_offset then VALUES "gs_gutter_os_ang" RANGE [90, 90] else VALUES "gs_gutter_os_ang" RANGE [atn(gs_gutter_os_off / (DsOffsetLength - minh_offset)), 90] endif VALUES "gs_gutter_os_m_lgth" RANGE [0, )
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! End Angles ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Uppmxang = (90-gs_gutter_os_u_ang)/2 values "gs_gutter_u_end_ang" RANGE [-Uppmxang, 90-Uppmxang]
Lowmxang = (90-gs_gutter_os_l_ang)/2 values "gs_gutter_l_end_ang" RANGE [-Lowmxang, 90-Lowmxang]
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! End Angles (synchronised temporary variables) ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ if up_end_ang_temp < ((360-90)/2)+90 and up_end_ang_temp > 90 then PARAMETERS up_end_ang_temp=90 if up_end_ang_temp >= ((360-90)/2)+90 and up_end_ang_temp < 360 then PARAMETERS up_end_ang_temp=0
if low_end_ang_temp < ((360-90)/2)+90 and low_end_ang_temp > 90 then PARAMETERS low_end_ang_temp=90 if low_end_ang_temp >= ((360-90)/2)+90 and low_end_ang_temp < 360 then PARAMETERS low_end_ang_temp=0
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "up_end_ang_temp" then PARAMETERS gs_gutter_u_end_ang = up_end_ang_temp - (Uppmxang) else PARAMETERS up_end_ang_temp = gs_gutter_u_end_ang + (Uppmxang) endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "low_end_ang_temp" then PARAMETERS gs_gutter_l_end_ang = low_end_ang_temp - (Lowmxang) else PARAMETERS low_end_ang_temp = gs_gutter_l_end_ang + (Lowmxang) endif
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Upper and Lower Angles (synchronised temporary variables) ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ if gs_gutter_os_u_ang < 225 and gs_gutter_os_u_ang > 89 then parameters gs_gutter_os_u_ang = 89 if gs_gutter_os_u_ang >= 225 and gs_gutter_os_u_ang < 360 then parameters gs_gutter_os_u_ang = 0
if gs_gutter_os_l_ang < 225 and gs_gutter_os_l_ang > 89 then parameters gs_gutter_os_l_ang = 89 if gs_gutter_os_l_ang >= 225 and gs_gutter_os_l_ang < 360 then parameters gs_gutter_os_l_ang = 0
if gs_gutter_os_u_ang < 0 then PARAMETERS gs_gutter_os_u_ang=0 if gs_gutter_os_l_ang < 0 then PARAMETERS gs_gutter_os_l_ang=0
if not(gs_downspout_offset) then hideparameter "DsOffsetLength", "gs_gutter_os_u_lgth", "gs_gutter_os_u_ang", "gs_gutter_u_end_ang", "gs_gutter_os_off", "gs_gutter_os_l_lgth", "gs_gutter_os_ang" lock "DsOffsetLength", "gs_gutter_os_u_lgth", "gs_gutter_os_u_ang", "gs_gutter_u_end_ang", "gs_gutter_os_off", "gs_gutter_os_l_lgth", "gs_gutter_os_ang" endif
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! 3D Representation ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ values "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`, `Простой`, `Откл.` values "gs_detlevel_3D_m" DETLEVEL_3D_OFF, DETLEVEL_3D_SIMPLE, DETLEVEL_3D_DETAILED
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" then gs_detlevel_3D_m = DETLEVEL_3D_DETAILED if gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` then gs_detlevel_3D_m = DETLEVEL_3D_SIMPLE if gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` then gs_detlevel_3D_m = DETLEVEL_3D_OFF parameters gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m else gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` if gs_detlevel_3D_m = DETLEVEL_3D_SIMPLE then gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` if gs_detlevel_3D_m = DETLEVEL_3D_OFF then gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` parameters gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D endif
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Simple Model ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 then ! Simple ! --- Hanger LOCK "gs_gutter_ds_h","gs_gutter_ds_h_dist","gs_gutter_ds_h_off","gs_gutter_ds_h_pos","gs_gutter_ds_h_pos_mod","gs_gutter_ds_h_mat" ! --- Gutter Guard LOCK "gs_gutter_hl_guard", "gs_gutter_guard_mat", "gs_resol" endif
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! 2D Representation ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ VALUES "floorPlanDisplayType" `Сечение и Низ`, `Сечение и Верх`, `Символический`, `Только Контуры`, `Вся Проекция` VALUES "iFloorPlanDisplayType" DISPLAY_PROJECTED, \ DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_PROJ, \ DISPLAY_SYMBOLIC, \ DISPLAY_OUTLINES, \ DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_ALL
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "floorPlanDisplayType" then iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_PROJ if floorPlanDisplayType = `Сечение и Низ` then iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_PROJECTED if floorPlanDisplayType = `Символический` then iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_SYMBOLIC if floorPlanDisplayType = `Только Контуры` then iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OUTLINES if floorPlanDisplayType = `Вся Проекция` then iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_ALL parameters iFloorPlanDisplayType = iFloorPlanDisplayType else floorPlanDisplayType = `Сечение и Верх` if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_PROJECTED then floorPlanDisplayType = `Сечение и Низ` if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_SYMBOLIC then floorPlanDisplayType = `Символический` if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OUTLINES then floorPlanDisplayType = `Только Контуры` if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_ALL then floorPlanDisplayType = `Вся Проекция` parameters floorPlanDisplayType = floorPlanDisplayType endif
if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_PROJECTED then HIDEPARAMETER "overhead_Line_Type" endif if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_SYMBOLIC or iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OUTLINES then HIDEPARAMETER "cut_pen", "overhead_Line_Type" endif if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_ALL then HIDEPARAMETER "cut_pen", "gs_line_type" endif
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Basic geometric parameters ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ac_bottomlevel = 0 ac_toplevel = zzyzx parameters ac_bottomlevel = ac_bottomlevel parameters ac_toplevel = ac_toplevel
DSoffset_ver_offset = zzyzx - (gs_gutter_os_u_lgth + gs_gutter_os_m_lgth + gs_gutter_os_l_lgth + HL_Height*gs_head_leader) parameters DSoffset_ver_offset = DSoffset_ver_offset
HeadLeader_ver_offset = zzyzx - HL_Height parameters HeadLeader_ver_offset = HeadLeader_ver_offset
if gs_downspout_offset then HeadLeader_hor_offset = -gs_gutter_os_off-gs_gutter_os_u_lgth * TAN(gs_gutter_os_u_ang) parameters HeadLeader_hor_offset = HeadLeader_hor_offset else HeadLeader_hor_offset = -dis_wall + Bhalf parameters HeadLeader_hor_offset = HeadLeader_hor_offset endif
Symbol.Comment: Водоотводная труба с коленом, смещением верхней части и зависимым от этажа 2D-символом.
Symbol.Script_FWM:
actualGUID = FROM_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
_autoID = "A1FAC075-48BB-4F1F-8560-330D152D611A" _startID = "B8B22D7B-B159-4697-8848-D20D50E0A2A1" _endID = "AC96E5DC-2828-45F6-BEA0-0D6EF1B7D821" gosub "newparameter_FWM"
_startID = "AC96E5DC-2828-45F6-BEA0-0D6EF1B7D821" _endID = "CEDED6AC-8BB9-491B-A3A3-A10F544352E8" gosub "repairHeight_FWM"
! ============================================================================== ! Set migration GUID ! ==============================================================================
setmigrationguid actualGUID
! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== ! Newparameter: dis_wall ! ============================================================================== "newparameter_FWM": if actualGuid = _startID | actualGuid = _autoID then
bSuccess = STORED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_gutter_dd", _gs_gutter_dd) &\ STORED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_gutter_bb", _gs_gutter_bb) &\ STORED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_gutter_ds_profile_num", _gs_gutter_ds_profile_num)
if bSuccess then if _gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = 1 then ! if Downspout Profile is round dis_wall = _gs_gutter_dd else ! if Downspout Profile is rectangular or corrugated dis_wall = _gs_gutter_bb endif
parameters dis_wall = dis_wall endif
actualGuid = _endID endif return
! ============================================================================== ! Head leader could be placed incorrrectly in 19 ! ============================================================================== "repairHeight_FWM": if actualGuid = _startID then
bSuccess = STORED_PAR_VALUE ("ZZYZX", ZZYZX) &\ STORED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_elbow", gs_elbow) &\ STORED_PAR_VALUE ("zzyzx_elbow", zzyzx_elbow) &\ STORED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_gutter_ds_lgth", gs_gutter_ds_lgth) &\ STORED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_downspout_offset", gs_downspout_offset) &\ STORED_PAR_VALUE ("DsOffsetLength", DsOffsetLength) &\ STORED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_gutter_os_u_lgth", gs_gutter_os_u_lgth) &\ STORED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_head_leader", gs_head_leader) &\ STORED_PAR_VALUE ("HL_Height", HL_Height) &\ STORED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_gutter_ds_ang", gs_gutter_ds_ang)
minh_HL = 0.05 !from param script if _gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = 1 then minh_offset = _gs_gutter_dd else minh_offset = _gs_gutter_bb !params set in prev. migration step
!don't migrate angled downspout + offset, different geometry in 19 if bSuccess &\ ((gs_downspout_offset | gs_head_leader) \ & abs(gs_gutter_ds_ang) > EPS \ ) then bSuccess = 0
if bSuccess and gs_downspout_offset and gs_head_leader then offtop = gs_elbow * zzyzx_elbow + gs_gutter_ds_lgth + gs_downspout_offset * DsOffsetLength
if offtop + min_HL > ZZYZX then !repair offset upper length
if offtop - gs_gutter_os_u_lgth + minh_offset <= ZZYZX - HL_Height then gs_gutter_os_u_lgth = gs_gutter_os_u_lgth - (offtop - (ZZYZX - HL_Height)) DsOffsetLength = DsOffsetLength - (offtop - (ZZYZX - HL_Height)) parameters gs_gutter_os_u_lgth = gs_gutter_os_u_lgth, DsOffsetLength = DsOffsetLength else bSuccess = 0 !keep broken geometry endif else !repair HL_Height HL_Height = ZZYZX - offtop parameters HL_Height = HL_Height endif endif
if bSuccess then actualGuid = _endID else actualGuid = "" endif endif return
Symbol.Script_BWM:
targetGUID = TO_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ============================================================================== gosub "repairHeight_BWM"
gosub "newparameter_BWM"
! ============================================================================== ! Set migration GUID ! ==============================================================================
setmigrationguid targetGUID
! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== ! Newparameter: dis_wall ! ============================================================================== "newparameter_BWM": if targetGUID # "" then if gs_gutter_ds_profile_num = 1 then ! if Downspout Profile is round if abs(dis_wall - gs_gutter_dd) > EPS then targetGuid = "" else gs_gutter_dd = dis_wall parameters gs_gutter_dd = gs_gutter_dd endif else ! if Downspout Profile is rectangular or corrugated if abs(dis_wall - gs_gutter_bb) > EPS then targetGuid = "" else gs_gutter_bb = dis_wall parameters gs_gutter_bb = gs_gutter_bb endif endif endif return
! ============================================================================== ! Head leader could be placed incorrrectly in 19 ! ============================================================================== "repairHeight_BWM": if targetGUID # "" then
!don't migrate angled downspout + offset, different geometry in 19 if (gs_downspout_offset | gs_head_leader) & abs(gs_gutter_ds_ang) > EPS then targetGUID = "" endif return
